inclusion.criterion: Crossing-over to the other treatment arm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total time of sonolysis less than 40 min for patients randomized to the sonolysis group
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Carotid endarterectomy not within 2 days (48 hours) of randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not attending at least one of visits 3 (24 hours after CEA), 4 (30 days after CEA), or 5 (1 year after CEA)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Outcomes assessed outside the specified time windows
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: The safety population consists of all subjects in the FAS who did receive one of the study interventions
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients randomized to the control group who receive continuous TCD monitoring for 10 minutes or longer will be considered to have received sonolysis
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients randomized to the sonolysis group who receive less than 10 min of sonolysis will be considered to have received the control intervention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Carotid endarterectomy not within 2 days (48 hours) of randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not attending at least one of visits 3 (24 hours after CEA), 4 (30 days after CEA), or 5 (1 year after CEA)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has been participating in another clinical trial within last 6 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has any other medical condition that would make him/her inappropriate for study participation, in the Investigator opinion
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD with significant bilateral carotid stenosis. He reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or sensory/motor defects.
